nodes.bodyText: For translations you must only touch the default english strings in /values/ - the strings in other localizations will be overwritten each time. It is fine of course to change them in development to test but you should not commit anything except in src/main/res/values/ https://github.com/ankidroid/Anki-Android/wiki/Development-Guide#handling-translations

nodes.bodyText:
I believe the preferences will skew quickly if we attempt to maintain two sets.
Can you alter this to use the same strategy as you used with notifications preference and programmatically knockout the preferences you don't want?
I changed the code for this, thanks.
Agree, I'll set sHasRunWebBrowserCheck to true before return then.
